pages.text: Cosmic Creeper's are similar to Enderman and Creeper's however are always aggressive. When a Cosmic Creeper sees a target it will attempt to run up to it and teleport the target to it and instantly blow up with no cooldown or warning like a normal Creeper does. On death they will spawn 4 $(l:entities/cosmic_creeperite)Cosmic Creeperite$(/l) reinforcements
Cosmic Creeper's are found in a Comatose within the Illusion and Delusion biomes
